title: Fragment, ca. 1795
medium:
Medium: cotton plain weave.
Technique: printed by engraved plate
dimensions:
Warp: 217.5cm (85 3/4in.). Weft: 26c, (10 1/4in.). Both edges cut.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 52cm (20 1/2in.); Plate break visible.
description: Stripe of wreaths of leaves containing circular medallions of rosettes. In red on white.
